doc.summary: Marks a widget as enabled or diasabled.
doc.text: Marks a widget as enabled or diasabled.

doc.summary: Wraps a <ref cls="net/minecraft/client/gui/components/Widget">Widget</ref> into matching editor ops.
doc.text: Wraps a <ref cls="net/minecraft/client/gui/components/Widget">Widget</ref> into matching editor ops.

doc.summary: This interface can be implemented by widgets, so other <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/config/gui/ConfigEditor">config editors</ref> can control them.
doc.text:
This interface can be implemented by widgets, so other config editors can control them.
For example an editor for optionals can disable a widget if the user unsets the checkbox, so
no value should be available.
